title: The Meaning of Storms
description: When Aleksey lived in the shadows at the heart of the British Royal Family, he assumed he was the cuckoo in the nest, the one living a double life. He had no idea that he was surrounded by deceits even more deadly than his own. But now, buying Light Island has unearthed a long-buried secret so important that people are willing to kill for it. However, the first time in his life, this fight doesn’t actually affect Aleksey. He doesn’t need to risk everything he’s now got with Ben to battle the tempests of life once more. But,in the healing waters of Light Island, he’s come to understand that sometimes other people need a helping hand from one who understands the true meaning of storms.Word count approx :105,000 words
author: John  Wiltshire
